name: ROBOT·DEFEND·HOME
description:
CONTROLS

A or left-arrow: move cannon to the LEFT

D or right-arrow: move cannon to the RIGHT

SPACE or ENTER: place towers at level up

ROBOT·DEFEND·HOME is a tower defense. Destroying the enemies give you experience that increase your level and then you can get more towers. Each tower has different status and a random skill (from a poll of 20 skills), so choose carefully and see until where you survive.

At the level up screen, don't forget to read the effects for the skills:
